content: The Gore-Eye Daoist is a disturbing enemy with a large, bulbous tumor attached to his back that is covered in eyeballs. He mainly fights with his staff, which he uses as a blunt weapon. It also spews out large amounts of poisonous blood-red liquid over the battlefield. The blood makes the arena difficult to traverse, as any contact with the glowing center of the substance raises your poison meter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Gore-Eye Daoist is a disturbing enemy with a large, bulbous tumor attached to his back that is covered in eyeballs. He mainly fights with his staff, which he uses as a blunt weapon. It also spews out large amounts of poisonous blood-red liquid over the battlefield. The blood makes the arena difficult to traverse, as any contact with the glowing center of the substance raises your poison meter.
